Young, Bronsons Moved that director of Region II encourage all region mem¬
bership to support as individuals, by siting Congressmen urging passage of Senate
Bill 1292 re postal regulations for sending tapes, pointing out the particular
interest this should have for Region II because of distance from NAEB headquarters,,
Motion passed.
Bronson, Young; Moved election of Regional director should be by mail ballot
of region membership and constitution changes necessary to effect this be initiated.
Motion carried.
Bronson, Flynn; Moved that this meeting go on record to extend a vote of
‘thanks and appreciation to Haskell Boy ter and the staff of WABE and to Kenneth
Christiansen and the Southern Regional Education Board for hospitality, coopera¬
tion, and services performed in the conduct of the meeting. Motion carried.
Christiansen, Wright: Moved that Region II express appreciation to NAEB
headquarters and particularly President Frank Schooley for his attendance at this
meeting and encourage similar participation in future meetings of Region II.
The matter of future meetings was discussed. It was generally agreed than an
annual meeting would be helpful and a decision for annual meetings was inform¬
ally made.
